SELECT count(*) FROM KH_BOARD WHERE BOARD_CATEGORY LIKE '%'||#{category}||'%'

SELECT BOARD.BOARD_SEQ_ID, BOARD.BOARD_CATEGORY, BOARD.BOARD_TITLE, BOARD.BOARD_CONTENT, BOARD.USER_NICKNAME, BOARD.BOARD_REGDATE, COMMENT_COUNT, FAVORITE_COUNT, BOARD.VIEW_COUNT FROM (SELECT rownum AS rn, A.BOARD_SEQ_ID, A.BOARD_CATEGORY, A.BOARD_TITLE, A.BOARD_CONTENT, A.USER_NICKNAME, A.BOARD_REGDATE, A.VIEW_COUNT FROM (SELECT BOARD_SEQ_ID, BOARD_CATEGORY, BOARD_TITLE, BOARD_CONTENT, USER_NICKNAME, BOARD_REGDATE, VIEW_COUNT FROM KH_BOARD JOIN KH_USER USING(USER_SEQ) WHERE BOARD_CATEGORY LIKE '%'||#{category}||'%')A WHERE rownum <= #{page} * 10)BOARD JOIN (SELECT D.BOARD_SEQ_ID ,COUNT(F.COMMENT_CONTENT) AS COMMENT_COUNT FROM KH_BOARD D LEFT JOIN KH_COMMENT F ON D.BOARD_SEQ_ID = F.BOARD_SEQ_ID GROUP BY D.BOARD_SEQ_ID) COMMENT_TABLE ON (BOARD.BOARD_SEQ_ID = COMMENT_TABLE.BOARD_SEQ_ID) JOIN (SELECT BOARD_SEQ_ID, NVL(SUM(FAVORITE_COUNT),0) AS FAVORITE_COUNT FROM KH_BOARD LEFT JOIN KH_FAVORITE USING(BOARD_SEQ_ID) GROUP BY BOARD_SEQ_ID) FAVORITE ON(BOARD.BOARD_SEQ_ID = FAVORITE.BOARD_SEQ_ID) WHERE BOARD.rn >= (#{page} -1) * 10 +1 ORDER BY ${sortType} DESC
